str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To weep, weep for, mourn, lament. Of uncertain affinity; to sob, i.e. Wail aloud.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A primary verb; to 'chop'; specially, to beat the breast in grief.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To weep, weep for, mourn, lament. Of uncertain affinity; to sob, i.e. Wail aloud.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To be dying, be about to die, wither, decay. From apo and thnesko; to die off.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To sleep, be sleeping. From kata and heudo; to lie down to rest, i.e. to fall asleep.
